p: The immunomodulatory properties of propolis seem to be contradictory since propolis sometimes acts in the inhibition, as in the anti-inflammatory properties, and other times in the stimulation of the immune system, as in the adjuvant properties. This phenomenon is probably caused by the chemical complexity of propolis as a result of the synergism among the components, which can be varied according to the methods of extraction of the bioactive compounds [ 71].
